sentences.sContent: Scans of his chest, abdomen, and pelvis likewise showed nothing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Scans of his chest, abdomen, and pelvis likewise showed nothing.
sentences.sCn: 扫描他的胸部，腹部和骨盆也没有什么发现。

sentences.sContent: However, if you have pain in only one of your hips, you probably have either an uneven pelvis or unequal leg lengths.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, if you have pain in only one of your hips, you probably have either an uneven pelvis or unequal leg lengths.
sentences.sCn: 然而，如果你只是一侧髋关节疼痛，那么你可能骨盆不平衡或者腿长度不一致。

sentences.sContent: Though Ardi would have spent much of her time in the trees, her pelvis was adapted to walking upright when she came down to the forest floor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Though Ardi would have spent much of her time in the trees, her pelvis was adapted to walking upright when she came down to the forest floor.
sentences.sCn: 尽管阿迪一生中大部分时间也许是在树上渡过的，但当她下到森林地面上时，她的骨盆是适合直立行走的。

words.tran: [妇产] 骨盆测量；[妇产] 骨盘测量法

trans.tranOther: the set of large wide curved bones at the base of your  spine  , to which your legs are joined
